thread.title: BRIEF-Cequence Energy Announces Asset Sale And Operations Update

title: BRIEF-Cequence Energy Announces Asset Sale And Operations Update
text:
April 19 (Reuters) - Cequence Energy Ltd:
* CEQUENCE ENERGY ANNOUNCES ASSET SALE AND OPERATIONS UPDATE
* IN Q4 2017, PRODUCTION ASSOCIATED WITH B.C. ASSETS WAS APPROXIMATELY 663 BOE/D WITH AN OPERATING LOSS OF $172,000
* FIELD PRODUCTION ESTIMATES FOR Q1 OF 2018 HAVE AVERAGED APPROXIMATELY 6,900 BOE/D
* CEQUENCE ENERGY- IN ORDER TO ACCOMMODATE INCREASED NEW OIL VOLUMES,ACHIEVE STABLE RUN TIMES, BASE DUNVEGAN OIL PRODUCTION HAS BEEN TEMPORARILY CURTAILED Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
